name: Freeze Pong
description:
Snowballs is coming! Play the generic pong with ONE button and throw snowballs at your rival!

Controls:

  • LEFT mouse button or <SPACE> key to move your paddle.
  • Once you hit with your paddle 5 times, you will gain 3 snowballs.
  • Now every time you move, your paddle will shoot a snowball at your rival.
  • Watch out for snowballs! It freezes the paddle!

Tips:

  • Free mode at the end!
  • Unlimited snowballs, no freezes and out.
  • Discover how smart the computer know where to hit by the scope!

Sources:

  • Pong Clone In JavaScript
  • Build Your Own Basic Physics Engine In JavaScript
